agents.enrich: Enrich each sourced profile with detailed fields from provider profile endpoint before any screening decision.
agents.verification: Run rule-based screening against matching rules and attach human-readable explanation. In contact-all mode use needs_resume instead of early reject.
agents.add: Persist all non-rejected screening outcomes into internal DB with status and verification notes.
agents.outreach: Send first outreach in candidate language. If candidate needs_resume, request CV/resume explicitly and track delivery result.
agents.faq: Answer candidate questions in their language, keep message concise, and steer back to next required step.
agents.pre_resume: Before CV is received, maintain dialog policy: answer questions, request CV, schedule follow-ups, and transition states until terminal outcome.
